programme.title: Bride From The Past

programme.title: Hua Hee Seko-lah
programme.desc: In the wake of its popular local Hokkien drama Hua Hee Everyday, Hua Hee Dai presents a new Hokkien comedy, Hua Hee Seko-lah! A teacher, who volunteers to teach Mandarin in a Hokkien village, finds himself up against its Hokkien community whose old habits die hard. Living alongside the villagers, the teacher slowly redirects his hard-headed students towards Mandarin in its purest form, while personally experiencing the beauty of Hokkien culture.

programme.title: Rally for Love
programme.desc: The story starts with Malaysian badminton player Tang Jia Jie, who travel to Taiwan in search of the famous coach Xue Zhong Yong, who abandoned his mother, in an attempt to avenge her. Celebrating the anniversary of Astro Hua Hee Dai And Taiwans Formosa TV, this sport series feature cameos from top badminton players including Goh Liu Ying, Li Yang, Wang Chi Lin And Wang Tzu Wei.

Gino plans to get rid of Hani to hide his secret in order to smoothen his marriage with Tyas.

Its a non-stop trip full of fun, learning, and discovery.

From seeing who can build the best fort to a game of the floor is lava, the fun-tastic battles are non-stop.

Using colors, shapes, and different materials, Blippi shows how easy and fun it is to make something wonderful with your own hands. Get ready to be inspired to create your own masterpiece!

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: How does a recycling truck work? What happens on a farm? Will this object Sink or Float? Blippi explores the world around us with silly dance moves, fun songs, and awesome adventures. There is so much to learn about, it will make you want to shout BLIPPI!

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: Join Blippi for an exciting day at the fire station! He gets a special tour from a real firefighter, who shows him all the different parts of a firetruck, from the ladder to the siren. Blippi learns about the important equipment firefighters use and what it takes to be a community hero. Its a fun and educational look into the world of firefighting.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: As the sun sets, cuddle up for a relaxing evening sing-along with Baby John, featuring calm and sweet songs perfect for winding down before bed.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: The moon is out, but Baby John wants to keep playing! He learns that a calming bedtime routine can be a fun and happy part of the day, too.

programme.title: Oddbods: Short

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: Join Blippi on some amazing adventures, both near and far! First, Blippi heads all the way to India to ride in a rickshaw tuk-tuk! While hes there, he also gets to taste some delicious coconut water. Then, Blippi is back home exploring Tenino, Washington on a bicycle! He visits an outdoor play park, a fire station and more as he learns about being active and exploring the world around him!

programme.title: Blippi

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: Its time to learn some new sports with Blippi and Meekah! First, they visit The HUB Sports Center where they get to play all sorts of fun games with their friends. Then, Blippi visits Hwangs Taekwondo martial arts school to learn a new skill. He learns about the history and cultural significance of taekwondo and works with an instructor to master some exciting beginner-level moves. Its a day full of movement, learning and fun!

programme.title: Insectibles
programme.desc: While Chowser tries to prove his love to a suspicious new caterpillar, Grampss quiet camping trip with Zak is ruined by Adillas henchmen.

programme.title: Insectibles
programme.desc: While Hye and Lo become super-geniuses and try to bring peace to the yard, Grampss own attempt to be helpful with a new invention begins to backfire.

programme.title: Insectibles
programme.desc: Adilla controls Willow with a remote, forcing an alliance with Zak when the roaches, led by a magic 8-ball, try to destroy the Shrinkinator.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: ARPO and Daniel are on the move! From baking a pie to racing a remote-controlled truck, theyre always up to something active and fun.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! With a built-in radar system that scans for danger and an arsenal of baby gear set to deploy at a moments notice, ARPO is programmed to protect. As simple tasks like bath time, feeding, taking a nap, and changing diapers somehow turn into action-packed adventures thanks to Dannys curiosity, ARPO has his work cut out for him.

programme.desc: Arpo teaches Daniel lessons about safety and science, from earthquake drills to the magic of magnets, making every day a fun learning adventure.

Its a non-stop trip full of fun, learning, and discovery.

programme.title: Bluey

programme.title: Bluey

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Ainnura akhirnya bersedia untuk berkahwin dengan Fariz untuk kali kedua tetapi memberi syarat supaya Rohana sendiri yang meminangnya. Fariz juga tidak dibenarkan mempersoalkan siapa Fawwaz yang sebenarnya kerana Fawwaz bukan anak kandung Fariz sebagaimana yang disangkakan oleh Fariz. Beberapa hari sebelum pernikahan Ainnura dan Fariz, Tok Wan meninggal dunia akibat terjatuh di bilik air.

programme.title: Sayang Papa Saya Tak
programme.desc: Farish who has just lost his wife is married to his sons caretaker, Raisya. Did they manage to keep their tested relationship strong even though they have to go through various obstacles?

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Oya berjaya mendapatkan sebuah rumah sewa dan mendiaminya bersama rakan-rakan terdekat. Mika tidak pasti jika dia mahu menyambung semula pengajiannya. Umai ada rancangan lain untuk dirinya.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Oya menggunakan apa yang dipelajari selama ini untuk membantu seorang pakcik yang cedera. Baby berkelakuan ganjil apabila berjumpa dengan seorang pesakit yang merupakan novelis pujaannya. Oya mula melihat sisi baik Mika.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Dr Erin masih keliru tentang siapakah gerangan Dr J yang misteri itu. Dr Aish dimarahi kerana memberikan diagnos yang salah kepada pesakit. Oya tidak pasti jika dia harus menceritakan tentang rahsianya.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Pian masih trauma mengingatkan kes buli yang pernah dialaminya dahulu. Baby mengalami kejadian yang aneh di hospital. Mika beri Oya semangat untuk terus bekerja.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Japor rasa sudah tiba masanya untuk dia berkenalan dengan gadis yang lain. Oya diberi tugasan daripada Dr. Erin untuk mengambilsatu barangan penting.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Setelah berusaha, akhirnya Fariz berjaya mengajak Ainnura keluar. Fariz berterus terang yang dia masih sayangkan Ainnura. Ainnura serba salah kerana dia tahu yang Datuk Rashid mahu menjodohkan Fariz dengan anaknya, Rania. Dalam waktu yang sama, Datuk Rashid juga cuba mengeratkan hubungan Ainnura dengan Reza.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Tok Wan kurang senang apabila mengetahui Ainnura menjalin semula hubungan dengan Fariz. Dia mahu Ainnura putuskan hubungan dengan Fariz. Justeru, Tok Wan menyokong usaha Ilah untuk menjodohkan Ainnura dengan pemuda pilihan Ilah. Demi cintanya pada Ainnura, Fariz saggup berdepan dengan Tok Wan dalam usaha merayu Tok Wan agar merestui hubungan mereka berdua sebagaimana yang pernah Tok Wan lakukan enam tahun lalu.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Rania cuba menarik perhatian Fariz tetapi usahanya sia-sia. Akhirnya Rania menyerah kalah dan yakin cinta Fariz bukan miliknya. Bagaimanapun Datuk Rashid mendesak Rania supaya usaha lagi dan jangan mudah mengaku kalah. Dia mahu Fariz menjadi menantunya demi legasi syarikat mereka. Sementara itu, kesungguhan Fariz untuk mendapatkan semula Ainnura telah melembutkan hati Tok Wan. Dalam usaha membantu Fariz, Tok Wan sengaja merancangkan sesuatu untuk merapatkan hubungan Fariz dengan Ainnura dan Fawwaz.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Tindakan Tok Wan merapatkan hubungan Ainnura dengan Fariz menimbulkan kemarahan Ilah. Ilah tetap berkeras untuk jodohkan Ainnura dengan lelaki pilihannya. Apabila Ainnura tidak setuju dengan pilihan Ilah, Tok Wan sengaja membuat dalih untuk kahwinkan Ainnura dengan Aidel iaitu kawan rapat Ainnura, bukannya dengan Fariz. Sementara itu, Rohana sudah membayangkan akan bermenantukan anak Datuk apabila Datuk Rashid menjemputnya mereka makan tengah hari sambil berbincang dengan perkahwinan Rania dengan Fariz.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Selepas kematian Tok Wan, Ilah berhasrat untuk membatalkan perkahwinan Ainnura dengan Fariz. Bagaimanapun Ainnura bertegas untuk meneruskan rancangan mereka kerana itu juga yang dimahukan oleh Tok Wan demi meliah keluarga Ainnura dan keluarga Fariz berdamai. Rohana menyokong keputusan Ainnura dan ini menyebabkan Ilah kecil hati dengan Ainnura. Ilah akhirnya tidak hadir pada hari perkahwinan Ainnura.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Sikap prihatin dan baik Rohana terhadap Ainnura akhirnya terbongkar apabila tujuan Rohana merestui hasrat Fariz untuk megahwini Ainnura hanyalah semata-mata untuk membalas dendam pada Ainnura. Rohana paksa Ainnura tinggal bersamanya dan jika Ainnura menujuk Fariz supaya keluar dari rumah tersebut, dia tidak halal susu yang diminum oleh Fariz serta menganggap Fariz anak derhaka. Sementara itu, dalam diam Ilah sebenarnya merindui Ainnura.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Rohana sengaja menyeksa fizikal dan mental Ainnura. Fazira melihat apa yang dilakukan oleh Rohana terhadap Ainnura lalu mendesak Ainnura dan Fariz keluar dari rumah tersebut. Bagaimanapun Ainnura enggan kerana tidak mahu Fariz dianggap sebagai anak derhaka. Gara-hara terlalu marah dengan Ainnura, Rohana telah menghentak kepala Ainnura ke dinding. Fariz perasan dengan bengkak di kepala Ainnura.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Ainnura berbohong dengan Fariz yang bengkak di kepalanya akiat terhantuk pada sinki. Dalam waktu yang sama, Rohana mendakwa Ainnura sengaja menolaknya sehinggakan dia hampir terjatuh. Fateha menyokong kata-kata Rohana, menyebabkan Fariz keliru siapakah yang benar di antara isteri dan ibunya. Ainnura bangkit mempertahankan haknya. Selain daripada Ainnura, Fawwaz turut menjadi mangsa Rohana dan Fateha dengan pelbagai penghinaan sehingga akhirnya kerana tidak sanggup melihat Fawwaz dihina, Fazira mengakui yang Fawwaz adalah anaknya.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Fateha dan Rohana terkejut apabila mengetahui Fawwaz adalah anak Fazira hasil hubungan terlarang dengan Raja Azali iaitu kekasih Fateha. Pada mulanya mereka tidak percaya tetapi ketika mereka hendak mendapatkan penjelasan daripada Raja Azali, Raja Azali telah ditangkap polis atas beberapa tuduhan merogol. Fariz meminta maaf di atas sikap Rohana selama ini. Ainnura telah lama memaafkan Rohana tetapi mahu Fariz menceraikannya kerana dia tidak mahu Fariz menjadi anak derhaka gara-garanya. Rohana terharu dengan sikap baik Ainnura dan merayu kemaafan daripada Ainnura.

programme.title: Sayang Papa Saya Tak
programme.desc: Farish who has just lost his wife is married to his sons caretaker, Raisya. Did they manage to keep their tested relationship strong even though they have to go through various obstacles?

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Reaksi Dr Aish terhadap kejutan yang dibuat oleh Dr Erin berlainan daripada apa yang Dr Erin harapkan. Pian mula rapat dengan Icha. Baby belajar cara untuk menguruskan pesakit.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Dr Aish berasa tidak selesa pabila Dr Erin cuba untuk mengetahui lebih lanjut tentang masa silamnya. Mika terkenangkan arwah ibunya apabila bertemu dengan seorang pesakit wanita yang sudah berumur.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Mika mula cemburu apabila melihat Oya rapat dengan Dr Aish. Seorang pemuda tampan mula mendekati Dr Erin. Harun mengusulkan sesuatu kepada Pian untuk merawati masalahnya itu.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Ramai yang terkejut bila mengetahu Dr Aish mahu berhenti kerja secara tiba-tiba. Oya diteguri kerana tidak focus di dalam kuliah. Kerana mash cemburu, Mika mula tidak endahkan Oya.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Japor mula merancang untuk mencari kenalan gadis yang baru. Mika meminta bantuan Japor untuk memikat wanita. Mika resah kerana belum berjaya mendapatkan pekerjaan.

programme.title: Eco India
programme.desc: With Indias population at 1.2 billion people, thats a lot of wood and lot of trees need to be cut down to keep up with demand.

programme.title: Striker Hati Ayah
programme.desc: Sofia susah untuk memilih antara dua calon, Raf atau Noah. Lalu meminta pendapat ayahnya, Adam. Kini dua lelaki tersebut terpaksa memenangi hati ayah Sofia, seorang peminat fanatik bola.

programme.title: Gebu Gebu Manis
programme.desc: Kisah Hamdi dan Dolah yang memulakan perniagaan dodol tetapi sering disabotaj oleh Amira yang cemburu dengan perniagaan dua orang sahabat ini.

programme.title: Perangkap Perkahwinan
programme.desc: Three best friends promised to get married, at the same time when they turn 26 years old. Their perceptions of marriage life begin to change and conflict ensues.

programme.title: Cik Puan Sinderella
programme.desc: This is a lighthearted family drama about a teenage girl who is closely guarded by her mother.

programme.title: Anak Kerak
programme.desc: Husin telah menggunakan ilmu hitam iaitu dengan Anak Kerak demi untuk mendapatkan kekebalan, kesenangan dan kemewahan hidup di dunia

programme.title: Jatuh Cinta Buta
programme.desc: Telefilem komedi romantik tentang perkenalan singkat di antara Zulin, seorang gadis yang tidak pernah bercinta, dengan Izlan, seorang duda dalam satu blind date yang diaturkan oleh Nadya Ramanshah.

programme.title: Matahari
programme.desc: Fauzi seorang guru yang telah dihantar untuk berkhidmat di Sabah. Di sana dia telah berkenalan dengan seorang novelis yang sedang mengalami masalah writers block iaitu Yazid.

programme.title: Meniti Cinta Di Starimost
programme.desc: Iman dipaksa berkahwin dengan Qaseh, anak kepada orang gajinya untuk mewarisi harta bapanya. Percutian mereka di Bosnia membuahkan bibit-bibit cinta. Lakonan Iqram Dinzly, Zarina Zainoordin dan Yana Shamsudin.

programme.title: Jula Juli Bintang Putus Cinta
programme.desc: Telemovie sekuel Jula Juli Bintang Cinta kini kembali! Kali ini, Jula dan Juli mengalami konflik percintaan dengan Dani And Izham sehingga mereka memutuskan untuk berpisah dan melarikan diri ke kampung Juli.

programme.title: Kampung Kuala Lambat
programme.desc: Kampung Kuala Lambat bagai mengalami sumpahan apabila lelaki yang berkahwin muda akan mati di hari pernikahan mereka namun kejadian ganjil ini tidak berlaku kepada lelaki yang berusia 60 tahun ke atas.

programme.title: Musnahkan Pelamin Anganku
programme.desc: Mikael yang merupakan seorang wedding planner menerima tawaran besar untuk menjayakan sebuah majlis perkahwinan pelanggannya. Namun majlis perkahwinan tersebut merupakan majlis bekas isterinya.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Dua
programme.desc: Kisah Farhan yang kehilangan kembarnya Fahrin dalam satu kemalangan tragis. Dia kemudiannya mengambil-alih kehidupan Fahrin namun terperangkap dalam sebuah cinta tiga segi pula. Lakonan Eusoff Hashim dan Sharifah Sakinah.

programme.title: Racun Menantu
programme.desc: After marrying Zain, Sara lived in the same house with Pak Dolah, her father-in-law. Because of the familys grudge, Sara started making trouble by seducing her own father-in-law.

programme.title: Cupid
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai seorang ejen yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat penghancur jodoh yang ditugaskan untuk memikat seorang wanita supaya dapat melupakan suaminya yang telah diisytiharkan meninggal dunia. Namun dia jatuh cinta pada wanita tersebut

programme.title: Cerai
programme.desc: Pengalaman berkurung dengan pasangan selama musim PKP memaksa dua pasangan suami isteri menilai semula perkahwinan mereka yang telah disalah ertikan selama ini.

programme.title: Hingga Jumpa Lagi
programme.desc: Eva is diagnosed with cancer and prays that she could travel back to the past in order to prevent the love between her and her husband so that her husband can lead a happy life. Her prayer is granted

programme.title: I Heart You Cik Yah
programme.desc: Zulkefli and Badariah are always arguing, but in order to prevent the factory where they work from being closed by Qarina, they must work together. Out of hatred, they start feeling for each other.

programme.title: Jihan Nak Displin Anak
programme.desc: Jihan dan suami kalut apabila anak mereka tidak mahu pulang beraya di kampung. Mereka cuba untuk mendisiplinkan anak mereka sebelum hari raya

programme.title: Satu Kampung Dua Orang
programme.desc: Selepas banjir besar melanda, semua penduduk kampung berpindah kerana kampung mereka tidak lagi selamat. Hanya dua beradik yang enggan berpindah atas sebab dan alasan mereka tersendiri.

programme.title: Jamil Balik Kampung
programme.desc: Kisah perjalanan Jamil pulang ke kampung untuk meminang kekasihnya setelah pinangannya pernah ditolak beberapa kali. Berjayakah misi Jamil kali ini?

programme.title: Sampai Nanti
programme.desc: Kyle dan Milly bertemu kembali setelah 10 tahun terpisah dan cinta lama kembali terjalin. Tetapi adakah cinta mereka akan terus kekal hingga ke akhirnya?

programme.title: Asam Pedas Cendol Sejoli
programme.desc: Karim adalah pemilik kedai cendol bersebelahan dengan kedai asam pedas Kalsom. Mereka bermusuhan, tetapi anak mereka Kinah dan Khalil mencintai satu sama lain, dan terpaksa menyembunyikan perkara ini bagi mengelakkan perang antara dua kedai mereka.

programme.title: Tolong Saya Encik Dinosaur
programme.desc: Elly berpindah dari bandar ke pekan kecil untuk mencari ketenangan. Tetapi kenangan buruk tetap menghantui dirinya, sehinggalah dia bertemu dengan Karl yang mengajarnya erti sebuah kebahagiaan.

programme.title: Cubit - Cubit Cinta
programme.desc: Kupid Cubit is a dating app that enables the masses to find love. But for Katarina and Saiful, its a platform for healing people with unrequited love.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Duit Kawin
programme.desc: Memaparkan pemikiran remaja sekarang terhadap perkahwinan dari sudut kos atas syariat agama tetapi tertekan cara hidup zaman kini yang mahukan kemewahan.

programme.title: Biarkan Cinta Tersenyum Lagi
programme.desc: Kisah penulis lagu Maya Arisa yang menghidap tumor otak dan mengimpikan untuk berkahwin. Dia kemudiannya bertemu dengan seorang jurugambar bernama Redza.

programme.title: Ayat Dari Langit
programme.desc: Ustaz Muiz dan isterinya mengajar ajaran sesat dan mahu pengikutnya mengikut telunjuk mereka yang lama kelamaan mula membuatkan pengikutnya bernama Kamal mula merasa sangsi.

programme.title: The Commando
programme.desc: A DEA agent returns home with PTSD after a botched mission and must now protect his family from a home invasion when a recently freed convict and his henchmen come after their stash of millions hidden inside of the agents home.

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Guns
programme.desc: A deputized gunslinger takes up the call to hunt down the last Cowboy, the chase is on and the bullets fly and only one of these hardened men can survive.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Hayes Hodges, an attorney, takes up the offer of defending his friend Colonel Terry Childers, accused of ordering his squad to open fire on a group of demonstrators.

programme.title: American Sicario
programme.desc: Based on the true story, Edgar Valdez, drug lord and cartel leader, is betrayed by one of the brothers. Seeking retribution, Valdez will risk it all to gain control of the Feliz cartel.

programme.title: High Voltage
programme.desc: After a lightning strike kills the lead singer of a band, she is resurrected with electrifying special abilities.

programme.title: Blood Of Redemption
programme.desc: When the most powerful criminal empire in the land comes crumbling down from within, it is up to a former henchman to put the puzzle pieces together in order to find those responsible and extract revenge.

programme.title: Centigrade
programme.desc: A married couple find themselves trapped in their frozen vehicle after a blizzard and struggle to survive amid plunging temperatures and unforeseen obstacles.

programme.title: Blowback
programme.desc: After planning a perfect heist, Nick is ready to score. One problem, his girl and the crew, have other ideas. They take Nick down in a hail of bullets but Nick doesnt die and in a race for his life, seeks revenge one target at a time.

programme.title: Mojave Diamonds
programme.desc: A former MMA fighter and his brothers must rescue their kidnapped family from a dangerous crime syndicate after $50M of illegal diamonds gets stolen.

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Max and Page, a brilliant mother-daughter swindler team, target the citys wealthiest men. Max marries them and then sues for alimony after she catches them involved in an affair with Page.

programme.title: In Isolation
programme.desc: Four friends wanted to get away from it all in a remote country house but when a mysterious injured man turns up on their doorstep telling tales of a city ravaged by a epidemic and the looters who have pursued him, the friends rally to help.

programme.title: Enter The Clones of Bruce
programme.desc: Enter the Clones of Bruce dives into the Bruce Lee exploitation craze, otherwise known as Bruceploitation.

programme.title: Any Bullet Will Do
programme.desc: Two Brothers find themselves on opposing sides of the fight as one hopes to help abolish slavery while the other believes it is his God-given right.

programme.title: Altitude
programme.desc: A female FBI agent is offered millions to help a thief escape from a hijacked airplane.

programme.title: Chosen
programme.desc: The Jews of Eastern Europe are being massacred by the thousands. Galvanised into action after the death of his wife, Hungarian barrister Sonson finds himself leading an inspirational fight back against the increasingly desperate and dangerous Nazis.

programme.title: Override
programme.desc: In 2040, a female humanoid A.I. is hacked by her husband and forced to kidnap the U.S. vice presidents son and execute him on live television.

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Escape Through Africa
programme.desc: Following a violent raid on her outpost, a British nurse, Anne is on the run with a small group of soldiers. She must balance bravery with compassion to save a native girl, her husband, and her colony.

programme.title: The Legion
programme.desc: Noreno, a half-Roman, is entrusted with the mission of crossing the snowy mountains of Armenia, swarming with Parthian patrols, to seek help for his slowly dying men.

programme.title: Crom
programme.desc: High school teenagers accidentally unleash an ancient Irish entity on their hometown and must stop it before midnight on Halloween.

programme.title: Johnny And Clyde
programme.desc: Johnny and Clyde are two serial killers who are on an endless crime spree. They decide to assemble a group of criminals and misfits to steal from Alanas casino and pull off the heist of the century.

programme.title: Project Legion
programme.desc: A young man trapped in his apartment with a swarm of demons outside his door must find a way to survive the night and escape from apartment 213.

programme.title: Chosen Family
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Broadcast
programme.desc: After a billionaire creates a drug called INOC which stops the aging process, the future of a world where death no longer exists is seen. The story of the fate of mankind is told while also revealing an elusive truth to its unknowing spectator.

programme.title: Hunting Games
programme.desc: Two dangerous armed men must hunt each other and fight to death over millions of dollars in cash in this high octane wilderness survival story.

programme.title: Mayfair - Shooting Paul
programme.desc: Hoping to put the past behind him and go legit, Max is persuaded by Paul to open a new Mister Mayfair club in Portugal. Conflict, however, seems to follow Max wherever he goes. Drawn into a violent turf war between London Gangsters and the Italian Mafia, his relationship with Ava is jeopardised by the arrival of his former flame, Serena. Maxs carefully crafted world seems to be collapsing around him. With his familys lives on the line, Max is blackmailed by British crime boss, Tommy, to assassinate his best friend, Paul.

programme.title: Hideout
programme.desc: Evading police at a remote farmhouse after fumbling a robbery, four criminals discover that the family living there is not who they appear to be.

programme.title: High Voltage
programme.desc: After a lightning strike kills the lead singer of a band, she is resurrected with electrifying special abilities.

programme.title: Blindfire
programme.desc: A police officer who while responding to a violent hostage call, kills the African American suspect only to later learn of his innocence. Sensing this was a set-up, and facing repercussions, he must track down the person responsible while examining his own accountability and the ingrained racism which brought him to this point.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong
programme.desc: This episode follows the seasonal eb and flow of the Mekong through Cambodia - a nation where everything has a special relationship with water.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong
programme.desc: The final country on the Mekongs journey is the home of the rivers mighty delta. A large deposit of nutrients carried downstream from hundreds of kilometres makes this region a biological treasure trove.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong
programme.desc: The Mekong Delta is one of the largest on Earth. Formed over the last 8000 years, it fans out and discharges into the South China Sea via nine channels.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas
programme.desc: Step into the Bay of Fundys surging waters. Learn how this east coast ecosystem sustains an abundance of creatures.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species.

programme.title: Big Cat Country
programme.desc: When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell.

programme.title: Big Cat Country
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her.

programme.title: Big Cat Country
programme.desc: The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK prides territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Follow vet Tim as he races to save rescued koala Ashley, then meet a flying fox with an extra digit who needs some TLC from vet Martine.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit
programme.desc: Dash across southeast Queensland as breeding and snake-catching season ramp up. Watch Adele and Mick go up against an eastern brown, the second deadliest snake in the world, while Stu and Liv tangle with a carpet python.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit
programme.desc: Launch into springs snake surge with Liv and Stu, who intercept two male brown snakes duelling for mating rights at a construction site. Stand back as Dan and Jess rescue chickens from a python, and Mick and Adele hunt for a rogue green tree snake.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit
programme.desc: Weave through Queenslands coastal chaos, where Jess faces her fears chasing a lace monitor lizard up a tree with an active beehive. Watch Stu cut a trapped eastern brown out of a fence and see Mick hunt a slippery python for terrified homeowners.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit
programme.desc: Dive into tight spaces, underneath hot houses, and into tense rescue situations as the catchers confront a six-foot-long, highly venomous brown snake. Then watch Stu and Liv relocate a coastal python threatening the safety of a homeowners pets.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit
programme.desc: Storm into a new suburb, where the wranglers keep deadly snakes from slipping into family homes. Watch as Stu and Liv pull an eastern brown from a job site, Jess and Dan expel a python from a shed, and Mick and Adele evict a red belly from a bedroom.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit
programme.desc: Respond to danger on a rural property with Mick and Adele, who brave a fired-up brown snake. Tread carefully as Jess and Dan extract a python from a play area, and get spooked when a chicken-hunting python squashes Livs hand during a tense rescue.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast
programme.desc: Track chimpanzees through the Rwandan forest with Max, who tries to convince these powerful monkeys that hes a friend, not a foe.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast
programme.desc: Peek inside the secret world of the fearless, often misunderstood sloth bear. Travel to Sri Lanka with Max and discover how this fierce, shaggy animal fights off leopards and other deadly rivals.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast
programme.desc: Prowl the Sri Lankan jungle with the leopard, who is a master of camouflage. See how this formidable feline hunter has adapted perfectly to the hot, dry climate on the island.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready for a day of fun and games with JJ! The excitement begins with a game of Peek-A-Boo, full of giggles and surprises. Afterward, its time to head to the kitchen for a musical Pat-a-Cake session. This is a story about the simple joys of playing, laughing, and making wonderful memories together.

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Buster becomes the backwards bus when he accepts a challenge from Bandit. He also becomes a bubble bus when he gets trapped in a giant bubble at the carwash. He and Scout race to get a new siren and he tries on new tires that are all the wrong size. He even becomes an ambulance bus to save his friend and a disco detective to find a lost friend in a disco tunnel.

programme.title: Go Buster: Specials
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve, but Santa has an accident and wont be able to fly his sleigh. So he calls in his old friend Jada and with the help of Buster the Bus, they can still save Christmas and make sure everyone gets their presents on time. Its a race against time, but Buster is up for the challenge!

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Buster is a cute and cheeky little bus with an adventurous spirit and an inquisitive mind. More than anything else, he loves exploring his high-tech hometown Wheelieville, riding into adventures both big and small with his vehicle friends The Bumper Bunch.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its time to come and sing with Little Angel! Join Baby John as he learns a valuable lesson about taking turns while playing with his family. The musical fun continues at the playground, where he sings about playing on the swings and slide. The day ends with a heartwarming song about the joy of sharing toys and playing together, making it a fun-filled day of music and learning.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Exploring the world is fun, but its also important to be safe! Baby John learns that some things are a no no, like touching a hot stove or running into the street without looking. Through gentle guidance and a catchy song, he discovers that rules are there to help keep him safe and sound while he plays.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its Little Angel! Where baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill inspire kids and families to have fun and to grow and learn through play. Come sing along!

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: All aboard the Morphle bus! Milas magic pet transforms into a big red bus for a fun-filled ride. But their joyful journey leads them to a bizarre discovery: a nearby town has been shrunk to the size of a toy! Its up to Mila and Morphle to investigate the strange phenomenon and figure out how to restore the tiny town to its proper size.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum: Lullabies
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum is here to help you fall to sleep with soothing, relaxing animated lullabies. These gentle and sensory videos are accompanied by lullaby versions of much-loved nursery rhymes, helping to take you to the land of nod.

programme.title: Oddbods: Short
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderfully weird world of the Oddbods! This collection of bite-size adventures follows seven colorful friends with very big, and very different, personalities. Whether its Fuses hot-headedness, Pogos pranks, or Zees laziness, their unique traits clash in spectacular fashion. Watch as simple, everyday situations spiral into unpredictable and hilarious mayhem, proving that with the Oddbods, life is never, ever dull.

programme.title: Oddbods: Short
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderfully weird world of the Oddbods! This collection of bite-size adventures follows seven colorful friends with very big, and very different, personalities. Whether its Fuses hot-headedness, Pogos pranks, or Zees laziness, their unique traits clash in spectacular fashion. Watch as simple, everyday situations spiral into unpredictable and hilarious mayhem, proving that with the Oddbods, life is never, ever dull.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: Nina Time
programme.desc: Get ready for a Pet Store Woof! Nina and her dad take a trip to the pet store, where her dog, Patas, uses his woofs to tell them everything he needs. Nina sings the Finger Family song as she helps her family members find their missing things. She challenges her friends to a soccer game and has a special secret on Nochebuena. Plus, she goes on an adventure with her stuffed bunny and builds a new paper doll friend with her Abuelita.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready to use your pedal power! Newt and her friends ride their bikes on an adventure to find a real-life Flutterbug. Pogo wants to pick a yummy Mang-Mang fruit, but he has to learn to be patient and wait for it to ripen. Jeff gets a cute but messy houseguest and Fuse has to be brave when he hears spooky noises in the night.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Welcome to the fantastical planet of Bod, home to the Minibods. Join six furry baby friends as they get up to hilarious mayhem, turning everyday situations into unexpected, super silly events. Whatever life throws their way, the Minibods overcome hurdles the unconventional way, to better understand themselves and the world around them.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Geckos Garage is the repair shop that cares. Run by cheerful mechanic Gecko and his trusty robot sidekicks, The Mechanicals, the garage takes care of all the vehicles in town and keeps them running smoothly. Whether its fixing a flat tyre, stopping a rocket-powered ice cream truck, or rescuing a vehicle thats stuck in the mud, Gecko is always on hand to help with a friendly smile and a can-do attitude!

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Meet the newest member of the garage crew: Baby Bus! This story follows her on her very first day. Shes a little nervous, but with the help of Gecko and her new friends, she learns all about her important job and discovers the unique things that she can do. Its a sweet tale about finding your place and being proud of who you are.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Welcome to the learning city farm! Help Ella count all the buses as they drive by. Join Grandma Mei for a fun and active dance session. Make a healthy salad while dancing the salsa and learn how to recycle to save the planet. Plus, learn a silly song to cheer up a friend and celebrate everything that grows with the Growing Song.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to explore Earth and nature! A frog ballerina shows Ella that rain can be fun and is important for the farm. The friends celebrate Earth Day by litter picking and composting. When some of the animals get sick, Ella helps the vet at a makeshift animal hospital. Plus, watch a caterpillar turn into a butterfly and learn some yoga moves with Rishis mom.

programme.title: Oh My English!(Celebrity)
programme.desc: Di SMK Ayer Dalam, Kelas 3 Merah terkenal sebagai kelas yang mempunyai berbagai kerenah. Pelajar-pelajarnya nakal, suka buat bising. Subjek yang mereka paling tidak gemar ialah Bahasa Inggeris.

programme.title: Oh My English!(The Blog)
programme.desc: Di SMK Ayer Dalam, Kelas 3 Merah terkenal sebagai kelas yang mempunyai berbagai kerenah. Pelajar-pelajarnya nakal, suka buat bising. Subjek yang mereka paling tidak gemar ialah Bahasa Inggeris.

programme.desc: Di SMK Ayer Dalam, Kelas 3 Merah terkenal sebagai kelas yang mempunyai berbagai kerenah. Pelajar-pelajarnya nakal, suka buat bising. Subjek yang mereka paling tidak gemar ialah Bahasa Inggeris.

programme.title: Oh My English!
programme.desc: Di SMK Ayer Dalam, Kelas 3 Merah terkenal sebagai kelas yang mempunyai berbagai kerenah. Pelajar-pelajarnya nakal, suka buat bising. Subjek yang mereka paling tidak gemar ialah Bahasa Inggeris.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Eps 01 Roz menjalani kehidupan normal sebagai seorang opah setelah pencen dari kerjaya lamanya iaitu ejen perisik. Suatu hari, cucunya Rin, telah menggodam satu permainan komputer dan dia dihubungi oleh seorang misteri dalam talian yang mengetahui identiti Rin. Roz mengesyaki sesuatu tidak kena, tapi malangnya Rin telah diculik oleh penjahat misteri tersebut sebelum Roz sempat bertindak.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep02 Roz cuba menenangkan Indah yang risaukan Rin dan Daniel yang telah mulakan penyiasatan. Namun Daniel tidak mahu mendengar nasihat ibunya, Roz. Daniel dan Roz menggunakan cara berbeza untuk mencari Rin. Pihak polis menerima rakaman pesanan suara Rin.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep03 Roz kembali beraksi setelah lama bersara, dengan bantuan Ejen Mah. Dia sampai ke lokasi yang disangkakan Rin ada di situ, malangnya pihak polis dan Daniel juga sampai ke situ. Daniel menyerang Roz kerana dia sangka Roz adalah penculik. Roz cuba melindungi identitinya sebagai seorang perisik.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep04 Roz, Datin Seri dan Ejen Mah kembali beraksi untuk menolong Roz menyelamatkan cucunya, Rin. Mereka dapat mengesan lokasi sebenar Rin dan menyelamatkannya sebelum Daniel dan polis tiba. Rin kini tahu identiti sebenar Opah Roz.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep05 Kegembiraan Roz dapat menyelamatkan Rin terbantut apabila penculik Rin telah melepaskan diri daripada tahanan polis. Roz juga mengaitkan kes penculikan Rin dengan kes Dr Kaos Jr yang terlepas dari penjara dengan rancangan jahat yang lebih besar.

programme.title: #Tom Tom Bak Series
programme.desc: Datuk Aznil Haji Nawawi turun padang sempena pencarian bakat baru #TomTomBak. Ramai yang hadir untuk menonjolkan bakat yang mereka ada. Bermacam ragam And aksi lucu dapat kita saksikan. Anak-anak yang petah berborak juga turut dicari untuk musim terbaru ini.

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Aly dan geng di perkenalkan kepada Ramona, yang memerlukan bantuan mereka untuk merakam video untuknya, yang sebagai gantinya, berjanji akan membuat video promo untuk kedai ayah Aly

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Mesin pencetak kedai Bob tiba-tiba rosak dan perlu diperbaiki. Aly dan geng mesti bergabung bersama untuk memperbaikinya untuk pelanggan. Namun, Nabil dan Eu Jin tidak hadir kerana mereka obses terhadap Akses Premium untuk permainan yang mereka mainkan.

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Mesin pencetak kedai Bob tiba-tiba rosak dan perlu diperbaiki. Aly dan geng Seorang pelanggan mencabar Aly untuk membuat produk untuknya, di mana dia belajar dengan bantuan rakan-rakannya apa yang diperlukan untuk merancang And membina penemuan baru sambil tetap teratur dan fokus.

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Ramona meminta bantuan Geng untuk menjadi influencer terkenal, di mana Aly dan geng membantunya membuat filter baru menggunakan kod mereka. Melalui usaha mereka, Ramona mempelajari bagaimana sikap pengguna dalam talian, sekaligus Aly dan geng membantu Ramona menghadapi masalahnya.

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Geng menemui bakat terpendam Eu Jin, iaitu menyanyi! Mereka semua berusaha untuk membuat lagu baru yang hebat dengan merakam audio dan muzik dengan pengkodan mereka sendiri, tetapi tanpa mengendahkan keinginan Eu Jin - yang akhirnya merasakan dirinya dipergunakan oleh geng.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Eps 01 Roz menjalani kehidupan normal sebagai seorang opah setelah pencen dari kerjaya lamanya iaitu ejen perisik. programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep02 Roz cuba menenangkan Indah yang risaukan Rin dan Daniel yang telah mulakan penyiasatan. Namun Daniel tidak mahu mendengar nasihat ibunya, Roz. Daniel dan Roz menggunakan cara berbeza untuk mencari Rin. Pihak polis menerima rakaman pesanan suara Rin.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep03 Roz kembali beraksi setelah lama bersara, dengan bantuan Ejen Mah. Dia sampai ke lokasi yang disangkakan Rin ada di situ, malangnya pihak polis dan Daniel juga sampai ke situ. Daniel menyerang Roz kerana dia sangka Roz adalah penculik. Roz cuba melindungi identitinya sebagai seorang perisik.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep04 Roz, Datin Seri dan Ejen Mah kembali beraksi untuk menolong Roz menyelamatkan cucunya, Rin. Mereka dapat mengesan lokasi sebenar Rin dan menyelamatkannya sebelum Daniel dan polis tiba. Rin kini tahu identiti sebenar Opah Roz.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep05 Kegembiraan Roz dapat menyelamatkan Rin terbantut apabila penculik Rin telah melepaskan diri daripada tahanan polis. Roz juga mengaitkan kes penculikan Rin dengan kes Dr Kaos Jr yang terlepas dari penjara dengan rancangan jahat yang lebih besar.

programme.title: Geng Gajet

programme.title: Geng Gajet

programme.title: Geng Gajet

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.desc: The era of high housing prices shocks the masses. However, some are willing to live in the mountains for their beloved parrots, just to give them the best breeding environment. Parrots have a long lifespan and their IQ is comparable to that of a five-year-old child. How do you make them behave? Training is actually a good way, but how? Melon seeds are key to the goal. If you want to raise a parrot, there are in fact many restrictions on choosing the right one. How should I put it? Dont miss Cute Pet Guide!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt has a heavyweight problem to tackle -V Kifarou, one of Flamingolands male white rhinos, has a skin infection. At Matts surgery, he operates on a kestrel with a broken wing. When wildlife rescuer Jean Thorpe arrives to collect the patient, Matt has another bundle for her, a poorly duck with suspected lead poisoning.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In the West Midlands a local vet has reported serious concern for a young dog thats recently left her surgery. The owners had refused to let the vets properly treat little Lola even though she had quite severe injuries. Inspector Herchy Boal has been called to help track down the owners and as its such a young puppy its critical Herchy finds her before its too late.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From Christmas as youve never experienced it before, with out-of-tune carol singers, Santa getting stuck, ungrateful children and exploding Christmas puddings - to OAPs, kids and even blundering burglars, six brand spanking new topics are given the trademark LOL treatment, combining user-generated footage with comic narration by comedian Iain Lee. Theres a treat too for animal lovers with a Puppies special featuring some of the cutest, as well as funniest, puppy clips on the web.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In the West Midlands Inspector Herchy Boal receives an anonymous call about a labradoodle who is reportedly underweight with infected ears and dirty matted fur. Its up to Herchy to get to the bottom of this reported neglect.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The meerkat king from Madagascar is funny, but meerkats in real life are well-behaved, cuddly and they heal our hearts! Pocket sized pets are currently all the rage, but there are details you need to pay attention to when raising them. For example, hedgehogs are highly defensive, timid sugar gliders will harm themselves without being next to their owners, and cute guinea pigs like Norman from the movie The Secret Life of Pets are easily abandoned due to being easy to obtain and raise, etc. Dont worry, experts will teach you how to raise them! Come to a restaurant in Kaohsiung to get up close with Rocket Raccoon from The Avengers!

programme.title: Comfort Food!
programme.desc: On this episode, its time to get cozy with some of our favorite Tastemade comfort food recipes. Get cozy and settle in for whats sure to be a mouth-watering journey!

programme.title: A Trip to Latin America
programme.desc: We hope you brought your passport, because were heading to Latin America! Whether its breakfast, lunch, dinner or dessert, were going to show you some delicious dishes, each with their own unique Latin flair!

programme.title: Cheese!
programme.desc: Today, its all about cheese: from the melted gooey-ness to just plain old slices, cheese makes the world go round. Well showcase recipes that feature cheese in all forms. So strap in, its time to get cheesy.

programme.title: Italian Classics
programme.desc: On this episode, were going to show you some of our favorite Italian classics. Pasta, pizza, and more... you name it, weve got it. So, what are you waiting for? Its time to get cooking!

programme.title: Pizza Time
programme.desc: Today weve got pizza all day for you: in the morning, in the evening, literally any time you want! Not only will we share some great recipes but we will let you know which ones are our favorites too. What are we waiting for? Lets get to the pizza!

programme.title: Southern Home Cooking
programme.desc: Today, were going on a trip down south for a taste of some country home cooking. Our quest for the best southern dish covers breakfast, lunch, dinner, and of course, dessert. But we better get moving, theyre ringing the dinner bell!

programme.title: Gingerbread Spectacular!
programme.desc: Its time to celebrate all things gingerbread! This classic holiday flavor gets an update from Mia. From the not-so-basic cake, to the most delectable cookie, and finally the ultimate gingerbread house; Mia will show why this is a holiday staple.

programme.title: Holiday Party Treats
programme.desc: Host the ultimate holiday party with these sweet and savory recipes for a crowd! Create a spread for all to enjoy. Mia will whip up wintery bark, bake a savory holiday wreath, and design a cupcake tree complete with sugared and piped ornaments.

programme.title: Frankie And Flour
programme.desc: Flour has the super power to transform into an endless variety of meals. Frankie teaches us how to make three different meals using flour as the affordable vehicle. Save money and strap on an apron. Its time to get messy in the kitchen.

programme.title: Hotdishes
programme.desc: You say hotdishes, Frankie says casserole. Either way, these one-pot hotdishes are an affordable way to feed a group of people, or the family for dinner. Plus theyre great to freeze for future meals!

programme.title: Party for Pennies
programme.desc: Frankie makes three dishes for a party of four, that when combined, are cheaper than just one meal out for brunch. Then, its a taco party for five people for only $20!

programme.title: Food Back from the Dead
programme.desc: Stale bread, old bananas, canned food, dry foods... theyve all gotten a bad wrap, but this is not the end of them yet! Dont let this stuff sit in the pantry, dont let it go to waste - Frankie encourages you to stretch further and cheaper!

programme.title: Wrap it Up!
programme.desc: First, Frankie packs a one-two punch of bargain and nutrition with butternut squash in three nostalgic, old school dishes. Then he shows you how to prep portable wraps at home for easy, peasey lunches.

programme.title: Bacon My Heart
programme.desc: Versatility is important. These three items - bacon, eggs, and a whole chicken - will feed you a plethora of delicious meals... and for cheap!

programme.title: Instant Gratification
programme.desc: Everyone loves carbs! Endlessly versatile, cheap, and super filling - Frankie shows you tricks for pasta, pizza dough, and delicious, easy ramen meals that arent soup.

programme.title: Cauliflowers Star Power
programme.desc: Cauliflower is a star and can be transformed into unexpected dishes. Plus its delicious and nutritious! Frankie reminds us to buy dried-goods in bulk and makes a big chuck roast that stretches over three dishes.

programme.title: Traveling for Your Tastebuds
programme.desc: You dont have to travel half way around the world to try a different cuisine - Italian and Filipino foods are accessible right here, right now.

programme.title: Street Food Faves at Home
programme.desc: Frankie makes street food at home. Its fresher, healthier, and cheaper! Then - get ready! - because youve never seen rice like this before.

programme.title: Sweet on You
programme.desc: Sweet potatoes and a sweet tooth - Frankies got you covered on the cheap and full of nutrition. Some times, youve got to indulge!

programme.title: Save Dough, Make Dough

programme.title: Veggies Veggies Everywhere
programme.desc: Today, well be showing you how to use green veggies in every meal, including snacks! We hope youre ready, because Mom wants you to eat all the veggies on your plate!

programme.title: Comfort Food!
programme.desc: On this episode, its time to get cozy with some of our favorite Tastemade comfort food recipes. Get cozy and settle in for whats sure to be a mouth-watering journey!

programme.title: A Trip to Latin America
programme.desc: We hope you brought your passport, because were heading to Latin America! Whether its breakfast, lunch, dinner or dessert, were going to show you some delicious dishes, each with their own unique Latin flair!

programme.title: Cheese!
programme.desc: Today, its all about cheese: from the melted gooey-ness to just plain old slices, cheese makes the world go round. Well showcase recipes that feature cheese in all forms. So strap in, its time to get cheesy.

programme.title: Italian Classics
programme.desc: On this episode, were going to show you some of our favorite Italian classics. Pasta, pizza, and more... you name it, weve got it. So, what are you waiting for? Its time to get cooking!

programme.title: Pizza Time
programme.desc: Today weve got pizza all day for you: in the morning, in the evening, literally any time you want! Not only will we share some great recipes but we will let you know which ones are our favorites too. What are we waiting for? Lets get to the pizza!

programme.title: Southern Home Cooking
programme.desc: Today, were going on a trip down south for a taste of some country home cooking. Our quest for the best southern dish covers breakfast, lunch, dinner, and of course, dessert. But we better get moving, theyre ringing the dinner bell!

programme.title: Frankie And Flour
programme.desc: Flour has the super power to transform into an endless variety of meals. Frankie teaches us how to make three different meals using flour as the affordable vehicle. Save money and strap on an apron. Its time to get messy in the kitchen.

programme.title: Hotdishes
programme.desc: You say hotdishes, Frankie says casserole. Either way, these one-pot hotdishes are an affordable way to feed a group of people, or the family for dinner. Plus theyre great to freeze for future meals!

programme.title: Party for Pennies
programme.desc: Frankie makes three dishes for a party of four, that when combined, are cheaper than just one meal out for brunch. Then, its a taco party for five people for only $20!

programme.title: Food Back from the Dead
programme.desc: Stale bread, old bananas, canned food, dry foods... theyve all gotten a bad wrap, but this is not the end of them yet! Dont let this stuff sit in the pantry, dont let it go to waste - Frankie encourages you to stretch further and cheaper!

programme.title: Christmas Special
programme.desc: Chef Noah Galuten celebrates Christmas with his twist on the traditional Feast of the Seven Fishes including ceviche, crudo, oysters and more! Dont Panic!

programme.title: Grandmas Pizza
programme.desc: Chef Noah Galuten cooks classic Grandma style pizza including homemade dough, sauce and more. Dont Panic!

programme.title: A Journey to Salad Town
programme.desc: Salads can be way more fun! Come to Salad Town, for Mustard-Shallot Vinaigrette; Probiotic Ranch with Cheddar Croutons; a no-measure salad when for when youre in a rush; and the crunchy, crispy, acidic, cheesy, Chopped Salad of your dreams.

programme.title: Rustic Comfort Pastas
programme.desc: Perfect Pantry Puttanesca is packed with more flavor than you could ever hope for; a Rustic Pork Ragu will make you wonder why anyone ever makes Bolognese: and a Vegetarian Mushroom Ragu will make you wonder why anyone ever eats meat.

programme.title: Pizza Time

programme.title: Southern Home Cooking
programme.desc: Today, were going on a trip down south for a taste of some country home cooking. Our quest for the best southern dish covers breakfast, lunch, dinner, and of course, dessert. But we better get moving, theyre ringing the dinner bell!

programme.title: Gingerbread Spectacular!
programme.desc: Its time to celebrate all things gingerbread! This classic holiday flavor gets an update from Mia. From the not-so-basic cake, to the most delectable cookie, and finally the ultimate gingerbread house; Mia will show why this is a holiday staple.

programme.title: Holiday Party Treats
programme.desc: Host the ultimate holiday party with these sweet and savory recipes for a crowd! Create a spread for all to enjoy. Mia will whip up wintery bark, bake a savory holiday wreath, and design a cupcake tree complete with sugared and piped ornaments.

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Latin-inspired ice cream to Caribbean, Channa curry doubles to gourmet, deli sandwiches; Stephanie Izard shows what comfort food means to 3 very different cooks and learns how they turned their childhood memories into thriving food businesses.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: From brothers selling moms Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.title: Home Cooking
programme.desc: From a homerun Greek dinner party series to a backyard thats become a gourmet deli to a Burmese pop up running out of an apartment kitchen, Stephanie Izard meets cooks finding ingenious ways to serve mouth-watering food out of their houses.

programme.title: Farm Forward Cooking
programme.desc: From a chef creating dishes that combine her Mexican and Indigenous heritage to a pizza pop up that improvs with farmers market ingredients to a backyard-run Indigenous dinner series, Stephanie Izard meets cooks taking their lead from the land.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Side Hustles
programme.desc: From a lawyer to an actor to an insurance analyst, Stephanie discovers a world of folks whove turned their passion for cooking into side hustle food businesses. From dumplings, sushi and pretzels she explores how they balance their day jobs.

programme.title: Life After Restaurants
programme.desc: From backyard mariscos to Cantonese remixes of British hand pies to made-to-order slap noodles, Stephanie catches hangs with 3 chefs who left the traditional restaurant scene and found alternative ways to cook for a living and make the food they love

programme.title: Cooking with Fire
programme.desc: Stephanie meets 3 cooks who use fire in different ways to create distinct dishes. Using their love of cooking over an open flame; these cooks introduce her to the diverse flavors of Armenia; a classic Italian hero, and infrared grilled Brazilian BBQ

programme.title: Secret Pizza
programme.desc: With the help of a guide, Stephanie Izard explores the underground secret pizzas of Los Angeles, including an off-menu pizza at a cinnamon bun pop-up, apartment-cooked limited drop specials and gourmet sourdough pies made in pizza vans mobile oven.

programme.title: Holiday Cookies
programme.desc: Cookies are the number one baked item during the holidays. Mia shows us how to make some new and inspiring recipes; from buttercream stickers to zebra shortbread leading to a final bake that will make any cookie lover do a double take!

programme.title: Holiday Party Treats
programme.desc: Host the ultimate holiday party with these sweet and savory recipes for a crowd! Create a spread for all to enjoy. Mia will whip up wintery bark, bake a savory holiday wreath, and design a cupcake tree complete with sugared and piped ornaments.

programme.title: The Chicken Episode
programme.desc: If youre going to grill chicken, youll want to make it good. Chef Dale likes to kick up the heat with his angry chicken, a spicy, spatchcocked and grilled whole chicken, and his kung pao chicken wings.

programme.title: Brunch On The Grill
programme.desc: Wake up, its time to grill! Chef Dale greets the day with a showstopping dutch baby pancake and tangerine syrup, crispy hash browns topped with creme fraiche and roe, and a ham steak smothered in sweet cherry mostarda and red eye gravy.

programme.title: Vegetables, But Delicious
programme.desc: Grilling is the perfect way to imbue your veggies with deliciousness. Chef Dale crafts a family style platter of trumpet mushrooms, eggplant marinated in spicy ssam jang, and charred yellow squash served with a green goddess dressing.

programme.title: Kabobs and Skewers
programme.desc: Kabobs and skewers are a family tradition for Chef Dale. This Mediterranean-inspired meal features beef and shrimp kabobs with grilled tomatoes, potatoes, and eggplant, all served on warm pita with a tangy white sauce.

programme.title: End of Summer Seafood Feast
programme.desc: The end of summer is near, and Chef Dale goes out in style with a giant seafood feast! Lobster, crab, clams, shrimp, and scallops, all served directly on the table with plenty of buttery garlic bread. Thanks for watching, and until we grill again!

programme.title: Apocalypse Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks the summer off right with a burger blowout featuring Brisket Burgers with Grilled Onions and Blue Cheese, Shrimp Burgers with XO Sauce and a Fried Egg, and Lamb Sliders with Feta Ranch and dont forget the Lemon Oregano Fries.

programme.title: Sausage Egg And Cheese All Day Long
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings out the best of brunch with sweet and savory hits such as Bacon Wrapped Dates Stuffed with Chorizo, Maple Sausage, Egg, And Cheese Fried Rice, and the tastiest BBQ Duck, Egg, And Corn Scallion Pancake Sandwiches youve ever eaten.

programme.title: Summer Surf n Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster And steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf n turf by creating Pork And Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato And Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Perfectly Prepared Steaks
programme.desc: Big Daddy Dale Talde shows you how to marinate, prep, And grill up the biggest and best steaks out there. From a Hanger Steak with Salsa Verde to a Ribeye with Ginger Chili Relish, and tops it all off with the father of all steaks The Porterhouse.

programme.title: Pizza Party on the Grill
programme.desc: Its Pizza Time! Chef Dale Talde grills up amazing pizzas for every palate including a Detroit Style Pie, a Cheddar Naan Pie with a Spiced Chick Peas And Potatoes, and gives your childhood favorite French Bread Pizza a much needed upgrade.

programme.title: End of Summer Seafood Feast

programme.title: Holiday Cookies
programme.desc: Cookies are the number one baked item during the holidays. Mia shows us how to make some new and inspiring recipes; from buttercream stickers to zebra shortbread leading to a final bake that will make any cookie lover do a double take!

programme.title: Holiday Party Treats
programme.desc: Host the ultimate holiday party with these sweet and savory recipes for a crowd! Create a spread for all to enjoy. Mia will whip up wintery bark, bake a savory holiday wreath, and design a cupcake tree complete with sugared and piped ornaments.

programme.title: The Chicken Episode
programme.desc: If youre going to grill chicken, youll want to make it good. Chef Dale likes to kick up the heat with his angry chicken, a spicy, spatchcocked and grilled whole chicken, and his kung pao chicken wings.

programme.title: Brunch On The Grill
programme.desc: Wake up, its time to grill! Chef Dale greets the day with a showstopping dutch baby pancake and tangerine syrup, crispy hash browns topped with creme fraiche and roe, and a ham steak smothered in sweet cherry mostarda and red eye gravy.

programme.title: Over the Top Holiday Cakes
programme.desc: Mia Starr gives a crash course in her all-time favorite, most used decorating techniques. From piping styles to watercolor frosting to maximalist designs, she teaches the basics of holiday cake decorating, in her own signature style.

programme.title: Fantastic Pastry Presents
programme.desc: Tis the season for gift giving! Mia walks us through her favorite pastry presents to give to loved ones. From classic cookie gift tins to no bake cheesecakes to savory bakes of cheese and crackers. There is something here for everyone on your list.

programme.title: Bakes On A Budget
programme.desc: Money can be tight around the holidays. From the $3 cookies you will have to try to believe, to a show-stopping $25 trifle, Mia has got you covered - just because youre on a budget doesnt mean you have to skimp on style or taste!

programme.title: Bakes Around The World
programme.desc: Join Mia on a trip around the world without leaving the kitchen! From the Japanese Christmas Cake to Jewish Rugelach to German Pfeffernusse to Mexican Bunuelos. Your taste buds will get a tour with these holiday bakes from around the world.

programme.title: Hack Your Holidays
programme.desc: In this episode, you dont even need to turn on your oven! From a jaw-dropping cake hack, to fried biscuit donuts, you wont believe what you can do with pre-made desserts from the supermarket. Mia will show hacks and great tips for any home-baker!

programme.title: Baked With Pride
programme.desc: Mia Starr supports her LGBTQ+ community while baking up colorful creations including a Beautiful Baked Alaska, a Fresh Fruit Tart, a Citrus Marble Cake, and a Radiant Rainbow Crepe Cake. Let your Pride flag fly and your tastebuds will thank you!

programme.title: Summer Bakes
programme.desc: Cue the fireworks, were celebrating the 4th of July and summer! Mia is bringing the treats perfect for your neighborhood block party or while grilling in the backyard. Ice cream sandwiches, grilled fruit cupcakes, and fun twists on old favorites!

programme.title: Trick or Treats for Kids
programme.desc: Whether you have kids or are a kid at heart, these whimsical Halloween treats are delicious, easy bakes. From leftover Halloween candy bark to ghosty treats and monster cakes. These recipes are perfect to make with little ones.

programme.title: Hair-raising Halloween Cakes
programme.desc: Join Mia if you DARE for these Halloween cakes are sure to SCARE! Blood red velvet cake, marshmallow spiderwebs, bubbling caldrons and a cake that bites back will inspire some serious spooky vibes. Mia will seriously impress and teach you new skills

programme.title: Spooky Halloween Party Bakes
programme.desc: Make your Halloween Party the talk of every boy and ghoul in the neighborhood! Whether its the poisoned apples, the drippy candle cakes, coffin pies or savory treats (or tricks) these delicious bakes will surely delight and scare.

programme.title: A Thanksgiving Harvest
programme.desc: Time to dig in to the one holiday of the year that is all about the food! Think outside the pumpkin pie crust for these four unique offerings. Mias got you covered with the bread, two show-stopping desserts, and a creative way to use your leftovers!

programme.title: Holiday Cookies
programme.desc: Cookies are the number one baked item during the holidays. Mia shows us how to make some new and inspiring recipes; from buttercream stickers to zebra shortbread leading to a final bake that will make any cookie lover do a double take!

programme.title: Grill These Sandwiches
programme.desc: Mad Good Food Host Derrell Smith joins Chef Dale Talde at the grill as they cook up some stupendous sandwiches including a Salmon Pastrami Reuben, a Meatball Banh Mi, and even some Grilled Ice Cream Sandwiches.

programme.title: Summer Surf n Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster And steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf n turf by creating Pork And Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato And Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Taste Selebriti
programme.desc: A food-travelogue program where 13 local celebrities will return to their hometowns to share traditional cuisines, unique foods and popular dishes in their states.

programme.title: Travel Lawak
programme.desc: Sebuah program travelog yang menampilkan tiga pelawak popular iaitu Syuk, Sharif Zero, dan Mamak Puteh di mana mereka akan mengembara ke luar negara.

programme.title: Semmaiyaana Saapadu
programme.desc: A mom and her daughters modernize traditional cooking with healthier versions of beloved recipes, serving up nostalgia with a nutritious twist.

programme.title: Kak Kek Ke Kelate
programme.desc: Join alter ego Catriona Ross as she uncovers the most popular dishes, iconic locations, hidden gems and, as always, the vibrant people on her travels throughout Kelantan.

programme.title: RASA Anak Emak Anak Bapak
programme.desc: Program masakan ini memerlukan selebriti jemputan membawa ibu atau bapa mereka menjelajah Malaysia bagi merasa sendiri masakan kegemaran ibu bapa masing-masing.

programme.title: Garden of Treasure
programme.desc: Buckle up as Darren takes us back on the road in this new season! Join him as he discovers herb gardens filled with treasures across Malaysias farms And markets - and scales the mountains of East Malaysia, searching for the medicinal herbs used by the aboriginal people And local Chinese.

programme.title: Secret: Untold Melody
programme.desc: Yu-jun, an injured pianist, meets Jung-a in a college practice room, and they develop feelings for each other. He searches for her after she vanishes one day and discovers her secret.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: Following
programme.desc: Real estate agent Jung-Tae has a penchant for spying. He discovers the death of the social media star So-Ra. He is falsely accused of murder and is determined to find the real culprit.

programme.title: The Girl on a Bulldozer
programme.desc: As the girl seeks truth behind the sudden car accident of her father, anger and despair left her only one option.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Tazza: the Hidden Card
programme.desc: Go-nis nephew, Ham Dae-gil, enters the gambling underworld only to be used as a scapegoat in a deal gone wrong. Now hes planning his revenge by entering one big fatal game.

programme.title: Love Reset
programme.desc: A couple decide to divorce after two years of marriage. They revive a 30-day divorce settlement period from the court, but then they both lost memories after a car accident...

programme.title: Usury Academy
programme.desc: Kang-jin is bullied as the lowest-ranking boy at school with no presence and money. He starts a business on private loans by chance and soon rises to the top of the school hierarchy.

programme.title: Harbin
programme.desc: In 1908, Ahn Jung-geun and Korean independence fighters win against Japanese army. A year later, they head to Harbin as the Japanese statesman Uto Hirobumi is going for negotiation...

programme.title: Long Live the King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: Beautiful Vampire
programme.desc: A beautiful 500-year-old vampire has her carefully constructed quiet life put in jeopardy when she becomes attracted to her landladys doltish son.

programme.title: Montage
programme.desc: 5 days before the statute of limitations of a 15-year-old kidnapping case expires, a flower is left anonymously at the crime scene. A few days later, a similar kidnapping takes place.

programme.title: The King
programme.desc: Believing power is paramount, Tae-soo aspires to become a prosecutor. As he achieves his goal and rises swiftly to power, he also sees the cruelty of a life at the top hierarchy in 90s Korea.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Miss Fortune
programme.desc: Swindler Ji-Hye is looking to make her last big score. Together with her daughter, they infiltrate the house of a cultural property broker with a net worth of 60 billion won.

programme.title: Confession (2014)
programme.desc: Three lifelong friends get wrapped up in a robbery-arson case. Suspicious of the investigation and the police, Hyun-tae starts digging for the truth himself and asks his best friend for help.

programme.title: Bottom of the Water
programme.desc: Ga-youngs sister died six year ago. One day, Ga-young is chased by a vengeful water spirit who appears as her sister. She strives to solve the mystery of her sisters tragic death.

programme.title: Usury Academy
programme.desc: Kang-jin is bullied as the lowest-ranking boy at school with no presence and money. He starts a business on private loans by chance and soon rises to the top of the school hierarchy.

programme.title: Return of the Mafia
programme.desc: 10 years ago, the mafia family welcomed the entrepreneur Dae-suh as the son-in-law. They set up a company and Dae-Suh becomes the president. The family plot a conspiracy against him...

programme.title: Okay! Madam
programme.desc: A married couple unwittingly become involved in a rescue operation of a hijacked aircraft during their first-ever family trip abroad to Hawaii.

programme.title: A Year-end Medley
programme.desc: From awkward first love to crush on a friend and long forgotten love, 14 love-struck individuals are brought together at Hotel Emross on New Years Eve.

programme.title: The Roundup: No Way Out
programme.desc: There is a drug case links to an organized crime organization in Japan. Despite the expanding scale of the case, the beast cop and his team strive their best to arrest the criminal...

programme.title: Hidden Face
programme.desc: While Sung-jin is searching for his fiancee Su-yeon, he meets her friend Mi-ju. A breathtaking thriller unfolds in which Su-yeon, who is trapped in a secret room, witnesses a naked truth.

programme.title: I Dont Fire Myself
programme.desc: Being discriminated as a woman, Jeong-eun was dispatched and given great pressure to resign, but she is not willing to simply give up...

programme.title: 4pm
programme.desc: A couple moved to a new house, dreaming of a peaceful country life. But they face a terrifying reality due to their neighbor, who visits them at the same time every day with just silence...

programme.title: The Swindlers
programme.desc: Though each has their own motives, unlikely individuals from different sides of the law allies together to achieve a common goal - trapping the worlds most legendary con man.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E25

programme.desc: Gabriel se presenta en la clnica donde esta Rafael para ver a Clara Ines. Le pide al enfurecido Ral que se quede con el nio.

programme.desc: Clara Ines decide llevarse a Rafael a la mansion para poder cuidarlo mientras se recupera de su operacion; Ral apoya la decision.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E46
programme.desc: Una vez ms, Malena es vctima de los celos y la furia de Pablo, quien la toma del cabello y la arrastra reclamndole su infidelidad con Alfonso. Ricardo re por la manera tan fcil que engao a las Maras. Omar tratando de cuadrar la historia en torno al sicario. Entre promesas de amor y la pasion que los consume, Lorena y Alberto se entregan en cuerpo y alma.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E47
programme.desc: Pablo recibe la visita de un delincuente que le facilita un arma sin registro, para que pueda matar a su mujer sin ser rastreado. Alberto trabaja en un artculo para el periodico, cuando Lorena llega a su encuentro; siguiendo instrucciones de Gertrudis, le asoma a Alberto que Claudio est enamorado de su mam.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E43
programme.desc: Salvatore intenta evadir la pregunta de su hijo sobre las nuevas negociaciones alegando que deben viajar. En un estallido, Cesar le pregunta a su padre si se va a morir.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E44
programme.desc: En un nuevo da, un deprimido Cesar es sorprendido por Adriana quien ha ido a visitarlo acompaado de la pequea Tatianita.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E007 - Episodio 7
programme.desc: Nicols asegura a Fernanda que su camino no volver a cruzarse con el de Victoria. Rosendo est decidido a hacer pagar a Hilario lo que le debe. Pablo (Nicols) se ofrece a acompaar a Victoria a comprar un auto. Liliana le deja un sobre a Nicols en casa de los Alcoy. Victoria est a punto de descubrir la verdadera identidad de Pablo (Nicols).

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E008 - Episodio 8
programme.desc: Rosendo y Florencia logran escapar de los hombres de Hilario. Victoria y Pablo (Nicols) se besan. Antonieta decide aceptar la propuesta de matrimonio que le hizo Jons. Clemencia ofrece a Victoria guardarle el secreto de su romance y hacerle creer a Carmencita que andan juntas. Victoria y Pablo (Nicols) se confiesan mutuamente que se aman; el est dispuesto a contarle todo lo que ella ignora sobre el.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E27
programme.desc: Camila es atropellada por un desconocido que le advierte que deje de buscar a Rosa Blanco. Esto la inquieta y acude a Max pero el le dice que no lo involucre ms en este asunto. Todos temen el regreso de Rosa Blanco.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E28
programme.desc: Max y Ezequiel se enfrentan por Camila. Astrid trata de manipular a Roberto para sacarle informacion a cambio de dinero. Max acusa a Camila de prostituta y decide sacarla de su vida. El regreso de Rosa Blanco es traumtico.
